subject: writing testcase for data read from a file
msgSnippet: This is a sort of newbie question, could anyone please explain me how i can write a testcase for a method which is reading data from a file. Regards, Manpreet
messageBody:
This is a sort of newbie question, could anyone please
explain me how i can write a testcase for a method
which is reading data from a file.

Regards,
Manpreet
